programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Mga Batang Yagit
programme.desc: This tells the story of young orphans reduced to scavenging among garbage to make a living.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Pacifico Guevarra, Dillinger Ng Pares
programme.desc: Young action star Raymart Santiago played one of his most demanding roles as Pacifico Guevarra who called himself Dillinger after the American gangster whom he idolized.

programme.title: Alyas Waway
programme.desc: Waway was the notorious mad killer who ran circles around the people of Metro Manila during the 70's. Based on real-life events and features Cesar Montanos as Waway in one of his best performances.

programme.title: Ang Syota Kong Balikbayan
programme.desc: There is a budding romance between FPJ and Anjanette Abayari who has just returned home after living for years in the United States. But before a love triangle could be resolved there was the problem of a bag of diamonds hidden in the gasoline tank of FPJ's jeepney.

programme.title: Dunkin Donato
programme.desc: Donato and Buknoy has to win the championship of the interbarangay league. The money will be used to fund the many beneficial projects for the community. Will their talent be enough to win the game without having to resort to Magical Power?

programme.title: Miguelito (Batang Rebelde)
programme.desc: Mayor Ven Herera (Eddie Garcia) is grooming his only son Miguelito \"Mike\" Herera (Aga Mulach) to be his predecessor. Mike, however, has other plans and live a happy go lucky life.

programme.title: Anghel Na Walang Langit
programme.desc: Vina Morales played two very demanding roles. Two women unrelated and who have never met, but looking very much alike, found their lives entertained when the people close to them mistook them for one another.

programme.title: Pagbabalik Ni Kumander Lawin
programme.desc: Don Jaime (Robert Tlabis) is still bothered by his brother's death although the killer, Renato Solidum (Dante Varona), is currently languishing in prison. Only Renato's death will satisfy him.

programme.title: Anak Ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Puga
programme.desc: Willy (Rudy Fernandez) tags along with Mogan (Paquito Diaz) and Waldo (Ruel Vernal) when they escaped from prison. Outside, the three continue with their criminal activities to support themselves. Soon, Willy falls in love with Mogan's niece, Leonor (Cherie Gil). Can Willy turn the tables on Mogan and Waldo and bring them to justice instead?

programme.title: Dyesebel (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The retelling of the classic tale by the great Mars Ravelo. After years of hiding from a cruel, suspicious society on the land, mermaid Dyesebel (Charlene Gonzales) returns and falls in love with a man named Fredo (Matthew Mendoza).

programme.title: Tayong Dalawa
programme.desc: Sharon Cuneta teamed up with Gabby Concepcion in what is considered their best work together. Her coming to terms with her new, free lifestyle and how she cope with his former girlfriend, who refused to let him go is the gist of the movie.

programme.title: Diego
programme.desc: He is a member of an elite crop in the military. However,when his group decided to stage a coup against the government,he defied his head. What danger lurks in the jungle makes Diego a stark study of human fortitude and courage?

programme.title: Eseng Ng Tondo
programme.desc: FPJ played Eseng 45, a Manila policeman known for his proficiency with the 45 caliber gun. He was also known to be an honest and dedicated cop, the nemesis of evil in the crime-ridden area of Tondo.
